name: Foods of the World
description: Take a tour through the world's cuisine.
author: Tyler Jang
beginning:
It's time to take a tour through the world's cuisine! Every clue is found on a related Wikipedia page.

To start, find the town claimed to be responsible for Canada's national dish.

clues.text: Très bien! Next, it's not winter, spring, or fall. Wrapped in rice paper, you're on a roll!
Mmmm. Now, it's time to travel to Hawaii for one of their most famous dishes.
Yummy! Now, turn a steak into a pastry and what do you get? Find its namesake, himself.
Beef wellington will fill you up! Now, what's the national dish of El Salvador?
They're quite delicious. Now, find the namesake of the common burger.
Savory! Find the place where "red porridge with cream" becomes a tongue twister.
Taste buds twisted! Almost there. Find the world's top producer of cocoa.
Chocolatey! Lastly, find the national dish of Senegal!
You made it! Congrats, and I hope you enjoyed your food world tour!
